summary: This document is an email chain from July 2019 between an Assistant U.S. Attorney (AUSA) from the Southern District of New York (SDNY) and an OPR contact, discussing scheduling calls to discuss the SDNY's investigation of Jeffrey Epstein. The AUSA identifies themselves as working on the Epstein investigation and seeks to coordinate or deconflict with the OPR.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Identified as the subject of the current investigation being conducted by the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The email author from the SDNY, working on the Jeffrey Epstein investigation, reaching out to an OPR contact to schedule a discussion.

connections.person1: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York
connections.description: The AUSA is part of the SDNY team conducting an investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: SDNY Investigation of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: The Southern District of New York is conducting an investigation into Jeffrey Epstein, as referenced by an AUSA seeking to coordinate with another office.
personsInvolved: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: An Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York confirms they are working on an investigation of Jeffrey Epstein in July 2019.
The AUSA is attempting to schedule calls with an OPR contact for deconfliction or discussion regarding their respective matters related to Epstein.
The correspondence shows ongoing inter-agency coordination concerning the Epstein investigation in early to mid-2019.
